wordGroup: avian influenza 禽流感；家禽流行性感冒
avian influenza virus 禽流感病毒
influenza a virus 甲型流感病毒
pandemic influenza 大流行性流感

sentences.en: Every year new strains of influenza develop.
sentences.cn: 每年都有新的流感类型出现。

sentences.en: A new influenza vaccine, administered painlessly in a nasal spray, is effective for children.
sentences.cn: 一种新的流感疫苗以无痛的鼻喷剂接种，对儿童有效。

sentences.en: Some British doctors have pointed out that one of Britain's worst waves of influenza happened soon after the new coins came into use.
sentences.cn: 一些英国医生指出，在新硬币开始使用后不久，就发生了英国最严重的流感浪潮。
